reeler.name: Reeler
reeler.action_text: Perform the Reel Action. This counts against its 3/turn limit. An Assisted Reel still costs 1 additional AP.

redline_winches.name: Redline Winches
redline_winches.action_text: Gain +2 to your REEL Checks until the end of this turn. This may bring you above 9 Power.

careful_reeling.name: Careful Reeling
careful_reeling.action_text: Until the end of this turn Fish are unable to reduce their Hooked Conditions.

heave_ho.name: Heave Ho
heave_ho.action_text: The next Reel Action you perform this turn adds the adjacent Fisher’s POWER during an Assisted Reel instead of +2. This may bring you above 9 POWER.

defensive_posture.name: Defensive Posture
defensive_posture.action_text: Until the start of your next turn you choose the section and column damage is assigned to on your grid, even if the attack would choose where damage is applied.

emergency_repairs.name: Emergency Repairs
emergency_repairs.action_text: Remove 1 marked damage from your damage grid.

damage_control.name: Damage Control
damage_control.action_text: All of your Internals gain the Armor tag until the start of your next turn.

duck_and_cover.name: Duck And Cover
duck_and_cover.action_text: Until the start of your next turn FAR Attacks automatically miss you.

stand stalwart.name: Stand Stalwart
stand stalwart.action_text: You may fully clear any number of Conditions currently affecting you. Gain the Stalwart Condition.

sprint.name: Sprint
sprint.action_text: Perform the Move Action. This counts against its 2/turn limit.

burnout.name: Burnout
burnout.action_text: Choose an Internal that has not yet been Engaged this turn and that is not destroyed. It gains the Rapid Fire 2 and Unstable Tags until the end of this turn. If it already has Rapid Fire it adds +1 to the tag.

right_tool_for_the_job.name: Right Tool For The Job
right_tool_for_the_job.action_text: Your next attack this turn gains the Precision Tag and one of either the Penetrating, Crushing or Breaching Tags.

danger_close.name: Danger Close
danger_close.action_text: All of your FAR weapons gain the Point Blank tag until the end of the turn.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.action_text: Your next FAR attack this turn gains the Guided tag.

galvanic_shock_rounds.name: Galvanic Shock Rounds
galvanic_shock_rounds.action_text: Your next FAR Weapon Attack this turn becomes damage [0] and gains the following effect: “On a hit the target gains the Tranq 3 and Dazed 2 Conditions.” Weapons lose the Blast Tag for the duration of this attack.

hook_artist.name: Hook Artist
hook_artist.action_text: Until the end of this turn your CLOSE Attacks apply the Hooked 1 Condition on a hit. If they already apply the Hooked Condition they increase the value by 1.

wrangler.name: Wrangler
wrangler.action_text: Perform the Wrangle Action. It inflicts Hook 2 or Tranq 2 instead.

brawler.name: Brawler
brawler.action_text: Perform the Bash Action, it gains the Devastating Tag.

rallying_cry.name: Rallying Cry
rallying_cry.action_text: Target any number of Allies. They gain the Focused Condition.

bulwark_of_steel.name: Bulwark Of Steel
bulwark_of_steel.action_text: Target an adjacent Ally. You and the target gain the Ironclad 2 Condition.

pep_talk.name: Pep Talk
pep_talk.action_text: Target an ally. They regain 1d3 Marbles.

outmaneuver.name: Outmaneuver
outmaneuver.action_text: Target any number of Allies. They may immediately move up to 2 spaces

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Pulled 4, Drained 1 and Blind Conditions.

terrorize.name: Terrorize
terrorize.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Pushed 4 and Drained 1 Conditions.

dominate.name: Dominate
dominate.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Burdened 3 and Slowed 2 Conditions.

outwit.name: Outwit
outwit.action_text: Your next CLOSE or FAR attack this turn uses MENTAL and targets Willpower instead of Evasion. It is still a Physical Attack and can Critically Hit.

feint.name: Feint
feint.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Dazed 2 Condition and you do not provoke Reaction Attacks until the end of the turn.

expose.name: Expose
expose.action_text: On a hit you may remove any number of Conditions of your choice from the target.

goad.name: Goad
goad.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Frenzy Condition.

discombobulate.name: Discombobulate
discombobulate.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Restrained 3 Condition.

distract.name: Distract
distract.action_text: On a hit you may move the target up to 2 spaces in any direction. It also gains the Doomed 3 Condition.
